name: The Stacks
description:
Welcome to The Stacks, a retro platformer based on the book Ready Player One!

Please give us feedback at https://goo.gl/forms/de1Vp4bLQ31hPR5t1

Submit new game ideas at https://goo.gl/forms/qkohKckKvAloRYa53

All visual assets were created by the game developers (Vanadium Games) and all audio assets were created by other people, under a Creative Commons license (you can find out more in the Credits section just before the game starts)

Visit our website at www.vanadiumgames.xyz and join our mailing list to be kept updated about our new games.
